amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 115-815 to direct the Director of National Intelligence to create and implement a plan that expands the recruitment efforts of all intelligence agencies geographic parameters used in recruitment efforts so that rural and other underserved regions across the nation are more fully represented in such efforts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Hastings.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hastings amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
